name: src/jsonapi.es6
src/modules/DB.es6
DB
examples:
let db = new DB();
db('comment').insert({ content: 'hello' });

name: src/modules/Link.es6
Link
src/modules/Pool.es6
Pool
linkageOperation
deprecated:
use replaceLinkage, addLinkage, removeLinkage
instead of this.

name: src/modules/RESTful.es6
RESTful
description: wrapper function to make RESTful ajax request.

name: src/modules/Relationship.es6
Relationship
replaceLinkage
description: completely replace every member of the relationship.

name: addLinkage
description: add the specified members to the relationship unless they are already present.

name: removeLinkage
description: delete the specified members from the relationship.

name: src/modules/Resource.es6
Resource
flatten
src/modules/ResourceIdentifier.es6
ResourceIdentifier
examples: let identifier = new ResourceIdentifier({ type: 'foo', id: 1 });

name: src/modules/Response.es6
Response
description: The response object of jsonapi. used in {@link RESTful}.
